Uses of Class
uno.UnoCards

    • Uses of UnoCards in uno

      Methods in uno that return UnoCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UnoCards Player.getCurrentCard()
      A getter method to return the player's current card they are looking at.
      Methods in uno that return types with arguments of type UnoCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> UnoGame.createDeck()
      Method that creates all of the UnoCards objects for all 108 cards in a standard uno deck, placing them into an arraylist and shuffling it.
      java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> UnoGame.getDeck()
      Getter method to return the game deck.
      java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> UnoGame.getDiscardPile()
      Getter method to return the game discard pile.
      java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> Player.getPlayerDeck()
      A getter method to return the player's hand.
      Methods in uno with parameters of type UnoCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean UnoGame.isValid(UnoCards currentCard, UnoCards top)
      Method that checks if a card being played is a valid move.
      void UnoGame.nextCard(Player player, UnoCards currentCard, boolean isNext)
      Method that handles the logic of looking through different cards in the player's deck.
      void UnoGame.playCard(Player player, UnoCards playedCard)
      Method that handles the logic for playing a card from a players hand into the discard pile.
      void Player.setCurrentCard(UnoCards card)
      A setter method to set the player's current card to a new UnoCards object.
      Method parameters in uno with type arguments of type UnoCards 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.setPlayerDeck(java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> deck)
      A setter method to set the player's hand to an arraylist of cards.
      void UnoGame.shuffleDeck(java.util.ArrayList<UnoCards> deck)
      Method that shuffles the arraylist that holds the uno cards.
